subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: Original meaning was “cruel”. The sense “cool” is a {{psm|zh|en|cool|nocap=1}}.

subSections.title: Definitions
Usage notes
subSections.text: Whilst English "cool" may be used in a wide variety of contexts, {{lang|zh|酷}} (and, by extension, {{zh-l|酷斃}}) is usually only used to describe something [[fashionable]] or [[extraordinary]].
